doc:
Lori Singer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lori_Singer 0 Lori Singer (born November 6, 1957) is an American actress and cellist. She is perhaps best known for her role as Ariel Moore, the female lead in the 1984 feature film Footloose, and as Julie Miller in the television series Fame. Lori_Singer ( born November_6_,_1957 ) is an_American_actress_and_cellist . She is_perhaps_best_known for her_role as Ariel_Moore , the_female_lead in the_1984_feature_film_Footloose , and as Julie_Miller in the_television_series_Fame .
